EmailTemplate.description: Sent to customers who complained mistakes DEC08 IMPORT P3
EmailTemplate.name: TEMP- UK CASS IMPORT MISTAKE SOLVED
EmailTemplate.subject: Your CASS Import output Cycle 11/08 has been modified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer:
As you might have noticed this morning, an erroneous CASS Import output was sent to you this morning.
The problem has just been solved. We invite you to download the correct version at https://casslink.iata.org.
We take the opportunity to apologise for the inconveniences this might have caused to you. To our customers paying through direct debit, we confirm that the correct amount will be taken out of your account.
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.com/europe/cs. These queries will be answered with the highest priority.
Sincerely,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Your message received on {!Case.CreatedDate}: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time to our Customer Portal.
The enquiries received on-line will be managed with highest priority.
,
